title: National Guard Federalization Crisis: California Override and Constitutional Precedent
description: Investigate Trump's unprecedented federalization of 4,000 California National Guard troops, breaking 60 years of precedent. Document the constitutional crisis between federal and state authority.
research_areas: What specific date did Trump federalize California's National Guard?
What legal justifications were provided for overriding Governor authority?
How did California state officials respond to the federal override?
What court cases challenged this action and their outcomes?
source_requirements: Federalization orders, court filings, state government responses, National Guard deployment records
pdf_source: Constitutional Crisis Assessment_ The Convergence of Foreign Emoluments, Federal Overreach, and Popular Resistance.pdf
